These cards are all low grade, Lajoie appears about G/VG but has paperloss on the front. I cannot make any guarantees if there are trimmed cards etc. I am pretty sure the Evers portrait was an "A". It appears the bottom of Clarke (Portrait) is trimmed.



Please add $10 US shipping for 1 or 2 cards.

Buy 3 or more and shipping is free.


PP FF 


Thank you.



ALL SOLD
